rounds.scenario: you are a waiter informing a customer that their order escaped the kitchen.
rounds.transcript: My apologies, but your lobster has left the building. We're preparing a new one now. End scene.
rounds.reaction: honestly a bit rushed — slow down and develop building. more.

rounds.scenario: you are returning a cursed object to a skeptical shop owner.
rounds.transcript: This mirror is haunted, my cat is speaking Latin and I need a refund. End scene.
rounds.reaction: decent flow, but i'd love more commitment to speaking.

rounds.scenario: you are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
rounds.transcript: Careful with that latte. It's a portal to another universe. Just a heads up end scene.
rounds.reaction: you can push the character more — especially at Just.

data.summary: overall you came across as expanded. standout moment: "My apologies, but your lobster has left the building. We're ..."
